```py

from qiskit import * 

from qiskit.providers.aer import AerSimulator 

sim = AerSimulator(device = ’GPU’) 

qc = QuantumCircuit(2, 2) 

qc.h(0) 

qc.cnot(0,1) 

qc.measure(range(2), range(2)) 

job = execute(qc, sim, shots = 1024) 

result = job.result() 

counts = result.get_counts() 

print(counts)

```
